device/debug.html.title: 4.1.调试
device/debug.html.body:
4.1.调试
1. usb 协议调试助手

device/USBDongle/HW/Introduce.html.title: 4.2.1.硬件介绍
device/USBDongle/HW/Introduce.html.body:
4.2.1.硬件介绍
Block Diagram

Function Description

连接方式：USB
供电方式：USB
支持 SWD,USART 两种下载方式
支持跳帽进入 ISP 模式
支持 2.4G、USB 功能
支持 USB Mouse、USB KeyBoard 功能

device/USBMCUBoard/HW/Introduce.html.title: 4.3.1.硬件介绍
device/USBMCUBoard/HW/Introduce.html.body:
4.3.1.硬件介绍
Block Diagram

Function Description

连接方式：USB / 2.4G
工作方式：广电
USB Report Rate: 1000 Hz
按键数：LB / RB / MB / 前进按键 / 后退按键 / DPI
灯光效果：调节 RGB 呼吸灯，呼吸，智能光循环
低功耗（续航半年）
支持 USB 升级

ProtocolIntroduce.html.title: 5.上位机 Protocol
ProtocolIntroduce.html.body:
5.上位机 Protocol
EndPoint 定义与描述



NO
EndPoint
Type
Comment




1
EP0
Control,IN/OUT
USB Vendor Command


2
EP1
Interrupt,IN
Mouse & Consume Key


3
EP2
Interrupt,IN
Keyboard


4
EP3
Interrupt,IN/OUT
Read/Write: Button Function, LED RGB, Profile, Macro, Update F/W



Report Data Structure

    
         Byte \ Bit
         7 
         6 
         5 
         4 
         3 
         2 
         1 
         0 
    
    
         0 
         Reprot ID ( Reserved )
    
    
         1 
         CMD Status：0x00 ( Sucess ) ; 0x01 ( Busy ) ; 0x02 ( Failed ) ; 0x03 ( Not Support )
    
    
         2 
         CMD ID ( 命令 ID )：见无线适配器和双模游戏鼠标主控具体命令协议
    
    
         3 
         Data_Index ( 数据索引 LSB ): 命令的数据超过 57 Bytes 时，需要多次传输时的数据索引递减值。例如要传输 200 Bytes，则需要分 4 次传输，索引值依次为 3、2、1、0。0 表示最后一组数据
    
    
         4 
         Data_Index ( 数据索引 MSB )
    
    
         5 
         Data_Length ( 数据长度 ): 0~57 Bytes 
    
    
         6 
         Data 0 
    
    
         7 
         Data 1 
    
    
         ...... 
         Data ... 
    
    
         63 
         CheckSum: CheckSum = 55h - ( Byte0 + ... + Byte62 ) & 0xFF
    


CMD FLOW ( 命令流程 )

Protocol/TestModePro.html.title: 5.1.工厂测试协议
Protocol/TestModePro.html.body:
5.1.工厂测试协议
命令列表（CMD ID）



NO
CMD ID
Comment




1
0x01
获取设备 MAC 地址


2
0x02
获取设备 版本号


3
0x03
设置设备配对码

Protocol/factoryPro/getDeviceMAC.html.title: 5.1.1.获取设备 MAC 地址 [0x01]
Protocol/factoryPro/getDeviceMAC.html.body:
5.1.1.获取设备 MAC 地址

Set Report 数据格式

    
         Byte \ Bit
         7 
         6 
         5 
         4 
         3 
         2 
         1 
         0 
    
    
         0 
         [ OUT ] 0x28 ("(") 
    
    
         1 
         [ OUT ] CMD ID = 0x01
    
    
         2 
         [ OUT ] Device ID = 0x01 ( Dongle 设备 )、0x02 ( Mouse 设备 ) 
    
    
         3 
         [ OUT ] Data_Index ( LSB ) = 0x00 
    
    
         4 
         [ OUT ] Data_Index ( MSB ) = 0x00 
    
    
         5 
         [ OUT ] Data_Length = 0 
    
    
         6 
         [ OUT ] CheckSum: CheckSum = 55h - ( Byte1 + ... + Byte5 ) & 0xFF
    
    
         7 
         [ OUT ] 0x29 (")")
    


Get Report 数据格式

    
         Byte \ Bit
         7 
         6 
         5 
         4 
         3 
         2 
         1 
         0 
    
    
         0 
         [ IN ] 0x28 ("(") 
    
    
         1 
         [ IN ] CMD ID = 0x01
    
    
         2 
         [ IN ] Device ID = 0x01 ( Dongle 设备 )、0x02 ( Mouse 设备 ) 
    
    
         3 
         [ IN ] Data_Index ( LSB ) = 0x00 
    
    
         4 
         [ IN ] Data_Index ( MSB ) = 0x00 
    
    
         5 
         [ IN ] Data_Length = 6 
    
    
         6 
         [ IN ] MAC 地址第 1 位 
    
    
         7 
         [ IN ] MAC 地址第 2 位 
    
    
         8 
         [ IN ] MAC 地址第 3 位 
    
    
         9 
         [ IN ] MAC 地址第 4 位 
    
    
         10 
         [ IN ] MAC 地址第 5 位 
    
    
         11 
         [ IN ] MAC 地址第 6 位 
    
    
         12 
         [ IN ] CheckSum: CheckSum = 55h - ( Byte1 + ... + Byte11 ) & 0xFF
    
    
         13 
         [ IN ] 0x29 (")")

Protocol/factoryPro/getDeviceVersion.htm.body:
5.1.2.获取设备版本号

Set Report 数据格式

    
         Byte \ Bit
         7 
         6 
         5 
         4 
         3 
         2 
         1 
         0 
    
    
         0 
         [ OUT ] 0x28 ("(") 
    
    
         1 
         [ OUT ] CMD ID = 0x02
    
    
         2 
         [ OUT ] Device ID = 0x01 ( Dongle 设备 )、0x02 ( Mouse 设备 ) 
    
    
         3 
         [ OUT ] Data_Index ( LSB ) = 0x00 
    
    
         4 
         [ OUT ] Data_Index ( MSB ) = 0x00 
    
    
         5 
         [ OUT ] Data_Length = 0 
    
    
         6 
         [ OUT ] CheckSum: CheckSum = 55h - ( Byte1 + ... + Byte5 ) & 0xFF
    
    
         7 
         [ OUT ] 0x29 (")")
    


Get Report 数据格式

    
         Byte \ Bit
         7 
         6 
         5 
         4 
         3 
         2 
         1 
         0 
    
    
         0 
         [ IN ] 0x28 ("(") 
    
    
         1 
         [ IN ] CMD ID = 0x02
    
    
         2 
         [ IN ] Device ID = 0x01 ( Dongle 设备 )、0x02 ( Mouse 设备 ) 
    
    
         3 
         [ IN ] Data_Index ( LSB ) = 0x00 
    
    
         4 
         [ IN ] Data_Index ( MSB ) = 0x00 
    
    
         5 
         [ IN ] Data_Length = X 
    
    
         ... 
         [ IN ] 版本号形式未确定 
    
    
         ...+1 
         [ IN ] CheckSum: CheckSum = 55h - ( Byte1 + ... + Byte... ) & 0xFF
    
    
         ...+2 
         [ IN ] 0x29 (")")

         [ IN ] Data_Index ( LSB ) = 0x00

Protocol/UserModePro.html.title: 5.2.用户配置协议
Protocol/UserModePro.html.body:
5.2.用户配置协议
命令列表（CMD ID）



NO
EndPoint
CMD ID
Comment




1
EP3
0x01
保留


2
EP3
0x02
保留


3
EP3
0x03
设置 DRIVER 模式


4
EP3
0x04
获取 DRIVER 模式


5
EP3
0x05
设置 DPI 当前档位


6
EP3
0x06
获取 DPI 当前档位


7
EP3
0x07
设置指定档位 DPI (保留)


8
EP3
0x08
设置档位数 (保留)


9
EP3
0x09
设置按键宏


10
EP3
0x0A
获取按键宏


11
EP3
0x0B
设置当前灯效


12
EP3
0x0C
获取当前灯效


13
EP3
0x0D
获取当前电量


14
EP3
0x11
设置 Device 进入 BootLoader 模式


15
EP3
0x50
通知 BootLoader 设备更新 FW 版本并告知 FW 大小


16
EP3
0x51
向 BootLoader 设备发送 FW 文档中的数据


17
EP3
0x52
通知 Bootloader 设备退出 BootLoader

Protocol/userPro/setDriverMode.html.title: 5.2.1.设置 DRIVER 模式 [0x03]
Protocol/userPro/setDriverMode.html.body:
5.2.1.设置 DRIVER 模式
Set Report 数据格式

    
         Byte \ Bit
         7 
         6 
         5 
         4 
         3 
         2 
         1 
         0 
    
    
         0 
         [ OUT ] Reprot ID ( Reserved ) 
    
    
         1 
         [ OUT ] CMD Status = 0x00
    
    
         2 
         [ OUT ] CMD ID = 0x03 
    
    
         3 
         [ OUT ] Data_Index ( LSB ) = 0x00 
    
    
         4 
         [ OUT ] Data_Index ( MSB ) = 0x00 
    
    
         5 
         [ OUT ] Data_Length = 1 
    
    
         6 
         [ OUT ] DriverMode = ( 0x00,0x01 ) 
    
    
         ...... 
         [ OUT ] Data = 0x00 
    
    
         63 
         [ OUT ] CheckSum: CheckSum = 55h - ( Byte0 + ... + Byte62 ) & 0xFF
    


DriverMode = 0x01 （ 驱动程序处于激活状态 ）
DriverMode = 0x00 （ 驱动程序处于非激活状态 ）
注：
1. DRIVER MODE 时，Mouse & KeyBoard 才能修改客制化功能，以及激活高级高能，非 DRIVER MODE 时，设备不接受客制化命令( 0x03，0x04 除外 )，设备转变成普通的 Mouse & KeyBoard
Get Report 数据格式

    
         Byte \ Bit
         7 
         6 
         5 
         4 
         3 
         2 
         1 
         0 
    
    
         0 
         [ IN ] Reprot ID ( Reserved )
    
    
         1 
         [ IN ] CMD Status = 0x00 ( Sucess ) ; 0x01 ( Busy ) ; 0x02 ( Fail ) ; 0x03 ( Not Support )
    
    
         2 
         [ IN ] CMD ID = 0x03 
    
    
         3 
         [ IN ] Data_Index ( LSB ) = 0x00
    
    
         4 
         [ IN ] Data_Index ( MSB ) = 0x00
    
    
         5 
         [ IN ] Data_Length = 0 
    
    
         ...... 
         [ IN ] Data = 0x00 
    
    
         63 
         [ IN ] CheckSum: CheckSum = 55h - ( Byte0 + ... + Byte62 ) & 0xFF

Protocol/userPro/getDriverMode.html.body:
5.2.2.获取 DRIVER 模式

         Byte \ Bit
         7

         1 
         0 
    
    
         0 
         [ OUT ] Reprot ID ( Reserved )

         [ OUT ] CMD ID = 0x04

         [ OUT ] Data_Index ( LSB ) = 0x00 
    
    
         4 
         [ OUT ] Data_Index ( MSB ) = 0x00 
    
    
         5 
         [ OUT ] Data_Length = 0 
    
    
         ...... 
         [ OUT ] Data = 0x00 
    
    
         63 
         [ OUT ] CheckSum: CheckSum = 55h - ( Byte0 + ... + Byte62 ) & 0xFF
    


Get Report 数据格式

    
         Byte \ Bit
         7 
         6 
         5 
         4 
         3 
         2 
         1 
         0 
    
    
         0 
         [ IN ] Reprot ID ( Reserved )
    
    
         1 
         [ IN ] CMD Status = 0x00 ( Sucess ) ; 0x01 ( Busy ) ; 0x02 ( Fail ) ; 0x03 ( Not Support )
    
    
         2 
         [ IN ] CMD ID = 0x04 
    
    
         3 
         [ IN ] Data_Index ( LSB ) = 0x00
    
    
         4 
         [ IN ] Data_Index ( MSB ) = 0x00
    
    
         5 
         [ IN ] Data_Length = 1 
    
    
         6 
         [ IN ] DriverMode = ( 0x00,0x01 ) 
    
    
         ...... 
         [ IN ] Data = 0x00 
    
    
         63 
         [ IN ] CheckSum: CheckSum = 55h - ( Byte0 + ... + Byte62 ) & 0xFF
    


DriverMode = 0x01 （ 驱动程序处于激活状态 ）
DriverMode = 0x00 （ 驱动程序处于非激活状态 ）
注：
1. DRIVER MODE 时，Mouse & KeyBoard 才能修改客制化功能，以及激活高级高能，非 DRIVER MODE 时，设备不接受客制化命令( 0x03，0x04 除外 )，设备转变成普通的 Mouse & KeyBoard

Protocol/userPro/setDPICurrentMode.html.title: 5.2.3.设置 DPI 当前档位 [0x05]
Protocol/userPro/setDPICurrentMode.html.body:
5.2.3.设置 DPI 当前档位
Set Report 数据格式

    
         Byte \ Bit
         7 
         6 
         5 
         4 
         3 
         2 
         1 
         0 
    
    
         0 
         [ OUT ] Reprot ID ( Reserved ) 
    
    
         1 
         [ OUT ] CMD Status = 0x00
    
    
         2 
         [ OUT ] CMD ID = 0x05 
    
    
         3 
         [ OUT ] Data_Index ( LSB ) = 0x00 
    
    
         4 
         [ OUT ] Data_Index ( MSB ) = 0x00 
    
    
         5 
         [ OUT ] Data_Length = 1 
    
    
         6 
         [ OUT ] DPICurrentMode = ( 0x00,0x01,0x02,0x03 ) 
    
    
         ...... 
         [ OUT ] Data = 0x00 
    
    
         63 
         [ OUT ] CheckSum: CheckSum = 55h - ( Byte0 + ... + Byte62 ) & 0xFF
    


DPICurrentMode = 0x00 ( 档位 0， DPI = 400 )
DPICurrentMode = 0x01 ( 档位 1， DPI = 800 )
DPICurrentMode = 0x02 ( 档位 2， DPI = 1600 )
DPICurrentMode = 0x03 ( 档位 3， DPI = 4000 )
Get Report 数据格式

    
         Byte \ Bit
         7 
         6 
         5 
         4 
         3 
         2 
         1 
         0 
    
    
         0 
         [ IN ] Reprot ID ( Reserved )
    
    
         1 
         [ IN ] CMD Status = 0x00 ( Sucess ) ; 0x01 ( Busy ) ; 0x02 ( Fail ) ; 0x03 ( Not Support )
    
    
         2 
         [ IN ] CMD ID = 0x05 
    
    
         3 
         [ IN ] Data_Index ( LSB ) = 0x00
    
    
         4 
         [ IN ] Data_Index ( MSB ) = 0x00
    
    
         5 
         [ IN ] Data_Length = 0 
    
    
         ...... 
         [ IN ] Data = 0x00 
    
    
         63 
         [ IN ] CheckSum: CheckSum = 55h - ( Byte0 + ... + Byte62 ) & 0xFF

DPICurrentMode = 0x00 ( 档位 0， DPI = 400 )
DPICurrentMode = 0x01 ( 档位 1， DPI = 800 )
DPICurrentMode = 0x02 ( 档位 2， DPI = 1600 )
DPICurrentMode = 0x03 ( 档位 3， DPI = 4000 )

Protocol/userPro/setKeyMacro.html.title: 5.2.5.设置按键宏 [0x09]
Protocol/userPro/setKeyMacro.html.body:
5.2.5.设置按键宏
Set Report 数据格式

    
         Byte \ Bit
         7 
         6 
         5 
         4 
         3 
         2 
         1 
         0 
    
    
         0 
         [ OUT ] Reprot ID ( Reserved ) 
    
    
         1 
         [ OUT ] CMD Status = 0x00
    
    
         2 
         [ OUT ] CMD ID = 0x09 
    
    
         3 
         [ OUT ] Data_Index ( LSB ) = 0x00 
    
    
         4 
         [ OUT ] Data_Index ( MSB ) = 0x00 
    
    
         5 
         [ OUT ] Data_Length = （1 位侧键标志位 + n 位组合键） 
    
    
         6 
         [ OUT ] MultiKey = (1 表示侧键一，2 表示侧键二）
    
    
         7 
         [ OUT ] 自定义组合键一 
    
    
         8 
         [ OUT ] 自定义组合键二 
    
    
         9 
         [ OUT ] 自定义组合键三 
    
    
         ...... 
         [ OUT ] Data = 0x00 
    
    
         63 
         [ OUT ] CheckSum: CheckSum = 55h - ( Byte0 + ... + Byte62 ) & 0xFF

         Byte \ Bit
         7 
         6 
         5 
         4 
         3 
         2 
         1 
         0 
    
    
         0 
         [ IN ] Reprot ID ( Reserved )
    
    
         1 
         [ IN ] CMD Status = 0x00 ( Sucess ) ; 0x01 ( Busy ) ; 0x02 ( Fail ) ; 0x03 ( Not Support )
    
    
         2 
         [ IN ] CMD ID = 0x09 
    
    
         3 
         [ IN ] Data_Index ( LSB ) = 0x00
    
    
         4 
         [ IN ] Data_Index ( MSB ) = 0x00
    
    
         5 
         [ IN ] Data_Length = 1 
    
    
         6 
         [ IN ] MultiKey = (1 表示侧键一，2 表示侧键二) 
    
    
         ...... 
         [ IN ] Data = 0x00 
    
    
         63 
         [ IN ] CheckSum: CheckSum = 55h - ( Byte0 + ... + Byte62 ) & 0xFF

         [ IN ] Reprot ID ( Reserved )
    
    
         1 
         [ IN ] CMD Status = 0x00 ( Sucess ) ; 0x01 ( Busy ) ; 0x02 ( Fail ) ; 0x03 ( Not Support )
    
    
         2 
         [ IN ] CMD ID = 0x0A 
    
    
         3 
         [ IN ] Data_Index ( LSB ) = 0x00
    
    
         4 
         [ IN ] Data_Index ( MSB ) = 0x00
    
    
         5 
         [ IN ] Data_Length = (1 位侧键标志位 + n 位组合键) 
    
    
         6 
         [ IN ] 自定义组合键一 
    
    
         7 
         [ IN ] 自定义组合键二 
    
    
         8 
         [ IN ] 自定义组合键三 
    
    
         ...... 
         [ IN ] Data = 0x00 
    
    
         63 
         [ IN ] CheckSum: CheckSum = 55h - ( Byte0 + ... + Byte62 ) & 0xFF

Protocol/userPro/setCurrentRGBMode.html.title: 5.2.7.设置当前灯效 [0x0B]
Protocol/userPro/setCurrentRGBMode.html.body:
5.2.7.设置当前灯效
Set Report 数据格式

    
         Byte \ Bit
         7 
         6 
         5 
         4 
         3 
         2 
         1 
         0 
    
    
         0 
         [ OUT ] Reprot ID ( Reserved ) 
    
    
         1 
         [ OUT ] CMD Status = 0x00

         [ OUT ] Data_Index ( LSB ) = 0x00 
    
    
         4 
         [ OUT ] Data_Index ( MSB ) = 0x00 
    
    
         5 
         [ OUT ] Data_Length = 1 
    
    
         6 
         [ OUT ] RGBMode = ( 0x00,0x01,0x02,0x03 ) 
    
    
         ...... 
         [ OUT ] Data = 0x00 
    
    
         63 
         [ OUT ] CheckSum: CheckSum = 55h - ( Byte0 + ... + Byte62 ) & 0xFF
    


RGBMode = 0x00 ( 无灯效 )
RGBMode = 0x01 ( 循环灯 )
RGBMode = 0x02 ( 呼吸灯 )
RGBMode = 0x03 ( 跑马灯 )

         3 
         [ IN ] Data_Index ( LSB ) = 0x00
    
    
         4 
         [ IN ] Data_Index ( MSB ) = 0x00
    
    
         5 
         [ IN ] Data_Length = 0 
    
    
         ...... 
         [ IN ] Data = 0x00 
    
    
         63 
         [ IN ] CheckSum: CheckSum = 55h - ( Byte0 + ... + Byte62 ) & 0xFF

Protocol/userPro/notifyUpdataFW.html.title: 5.2.11.通知 BootLoader 设备更新 FW 版本 [0x50]
Protocol/userPro/notifyUpdataFW.html.body:
5.2.11.通知 BootLoader 设备更新 FW 版本
Set Report 数据格式

    
         Byte \ Bit
         7 
         6 
         5 
         4 
         3 
         2 
         1 
         0 
    
    
         0 
         [ OUT ] Reprot ID = 0x01
    
    
         1 
         [ OUT ] CMD Status = 0x00
    
    
         2 
         [ OUT ] CMD ID = 0x50
    
    
         3 
         [ OUT ] Data_Index ( LSB ) = 0x00
    
    
         4 
         [ OUT ] Data_Index ( MSB ) = 0x00
    
    
         5 
         [ OUT ] Data_Length = 4 
    
    
         6 
         [ OUT ] Data 0 ( FW 数据的字节数, unsigned int 的第 1 个 Byte )
    
    
         7 
         [ OUT ] Data 1 ( FW 数据的字节数, unsigned int 的第 2 个 Byte )
    
    
         8 
         [ OUT ] Data 2 ( FW 数据的字节数, unsigned int 的第 3 个 Byte )
    
    
         9 
         [ OUT ] Data 3 ( FW 数据的字节数, unsigned int 的第 4 个 Byte )
    
    
         ...... 
         [ OUT ] Data = 0x00 
    
    
         63 
         [ OUT ] CheckSum: CheckSum = 55h - ( Byte0 + ... + Byte62 ) & 0xFF

         Byte \ Bit
         7 
         6 
         5 
         4 
         3 
         2 
         1 
         0 
    
    
         0 
         [ IN ] Reprot ID = 0x01
    
    
         1 
         [ IN ] CMD Status = 0x00 ( Sucess ) ; 0x01 ( Busy ) ; 0x02 ( Fail ) ; 0x03 ( Not Support )
    
    
         2 
         [ IN ] CMD ID = 0x50
    
    
         3 
         [ IN ] Data_Index ( LSB ) = 0x00
    
    
         4 
         [ IN ] Data_Index ( MSB ) = 0x00
    
    
         5 
         [ IN ] Data_Length = 0 
    
    
         ...... 
         [ IN ] Data = 0x00 
    
    
         63 
         [ IN ] CheckSum: CheckSum = 55h - ( Byte0 + ... + Byte62 ) & 0xFF

Protocol/userPro/postUpdataFWData.html.body:
5.2.12.向 BootLoader 设备发送 FW 文档的数据
Set Report 数据格式

    
         Byte \ Bit
         7 
         6 
         5 
         4 
         3 
         2 
         1 
         0 
    
    
         0 
         [ OUT ] Reprot ID = 0x01
    
    
         1 
         [ OUT ] CMD Status = 0x00
    
    
         2 
         [ OUT ] CMD ID = 0x51
    
    
         3 
         [ OUT ] Data_Index ( LSB ) = 0xxx ( 最后一组数据时，此值为 0 )
    
    
         4 
         [ OUT ] Data_Index ( MSB ) = 0xxx ( 最后一组数据时，此值为 0 )
    
    
         5 
         [ OUT ] Data_Length = 1～57 
    
    
         6 
         [ OUT ] Data 0 ( FW 数据 )
    
    
         7 
         [ OUT ] Data 1 ( FW 数据 )
    
    
         8 
         [ OUT ] Data 2 ( FW 数据 )
    
    
         9 
         [ OUT ] ... ( FW 数据 )
    
    
         ...... 
         [ OUT ] Data = 0x00 
    
    
         63 
         [ OUT ] CheckSum: CheckSum = 55h - ( Byte0 + ... + Byte62 ) & 0xFF

         [ IN ] Data_Index ( LSB ) = 0x00
    
    
         4 
         [ IN ] Data_Index ( MSB ) = 0x00
    
    
         5 
         [ IN ] Data_Length = 0 
    
    
         ...... 
         [ IN ] Data = 0x00 
    
    
         63 
         [ IN ] CheckSum: CheckSum = 55h - ( Byte0 + ... + Byte62 ) & 0xFF
